TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRowsetInfo

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供 OLE DB 接口的实现，以供从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序使用。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetProperties (int cPropertyIDSets, Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBPROPIDSET[] rgPropertyIDSets, out int cPropertySets, out IntPtr prgPropertySets);

.method public newslot virtual instance void GetProperties([in]int32 cPropertyIDSets, [in]valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBPROPIDSET[] rgPropertyIDSets, [out] int32& cPropertySets, [out] native int& prgPropertySets) cil managed
Public Sub GetProperties (cPropertyIDSets As Integer, rgPropertyIDSets As DBPROPIDSET(), ByRef cPropertySets As Integer, ByRef prgPropertySets As IntPtr)

public: void GetProperties(int cPropertyIDSets, cli::array <Microsoft::VisualBasic::Compatibility::VB6::DBPROPIDSET> ^ rgPropertyIDSets, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % cPropertySets, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % prgPropertySets);

span.span: The number of structures in rgPropertyIDSets.

param.name: cPropertySets
param.span: 一个指向内存的指针，该内存中返回在 prgPropertySets 中返回的 结构数。

span.span: A pointer to memory in which to return the number of structures returned in prgPropertySets.

param.name: prgPropertySets
param.span: 一个指向内存的指针，该内存用于返回 结构的数组。

span.span: A pointer to memory in which to return an array of structures.

summary.span: 返回行集合支持的所有属性的当前设置。

span.span: Returns the current settings of all properties supported by the rowset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetReferencedRowset (int iOrdinal, Guid riid, out object referencedRowset);
.method public newslot virtual instance void GetReferencedRowset([in]int32 iOrdinal, [in]valuetype System.Guid riid, [out] object& referencedRowset) cil managed
Public Sub GetReferencedRowset (iOrdinal As Integer, riid As Guid, ByRef referencedRowset As Object)
public: void GetReferencedRowset(int iOrdinal, Guid riid, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % referencedRowset);
abstract member GetReferencedRowset : int * Guid * -> unit

param.name: iOrdinal
param.span: 为其获取相关行集合的书签或章节列。

span.span: The bookmark or chapter column for which to get the related rowset.

param.name: riid
param.span: referencedRowset 中要返回的接口指针的 IID。

span.span: The IID of the interface pointer to return in referencedRowset.

param.name: referencedRowset
param.span: 一个指向内存的指针，该内存用于返回行集合上解释此列中值的 接口指针。

span.span: A pointer to memory in which to return an interface pointer on the rowset that interprets values from this column.

summary.span: 返回指向对其应用书签或章节的行集合的接口指针。

span.span: Returns an interface pointer to the rowset to which a bookmark or chapter applies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetSpecification (Guid riid, out object specification);
.method public newslot virtual instance void GetSpecification([in]valuetype System.Guid riid, [out] object& specification) cil managed
Public Sub GetSpecification (riid As Guid, ByRef specification As Object)
public: void GetSpecification(Guid riid, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % specification);

param.name: riid
param.span: 要在其上返回指针的接口的 IID。

span.span: The IID of the interface on which to return a pointer.

param.name: specification
param.span: 一个指向内存的指针，该内存用于返回接口指针。

span.span: A pointer to memory in which to return the interface pointer.

summary.span: 返回对象（命令或会话）上用于创建此行集合的接口指针。

span.span: Returns an interface pointer on the object (command or session) that created this rowset.
